alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 24 at 3:25PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Box Butte County and Northern Sioux County. The heaviest snow is expected along the Pine Ridge in northern Sioux County. * WHEN...5 PM MST Monday until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and near zero visibilities in falling and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is potential for snow to change to freezing drizzle on Tuesday, possibly resulting in ice accumulations.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
